title: Payments & Coins
subtitle: Manage your subscription and purchase coins

coinPurchase.title: Purchase Coins
coinPurchase.description: Each scan costs 1 coin. Add coins to your account to scan more medicines or interact with the AI assistant. Gold members get discounted rates.
coinPurchase.warning: IMPORTANT: Coin purchase feature is currently under development. Please DO NOT make any payments as coins will not be credited to your account. Contact the owner if you require coins.
coinPurchase.error: Payment was successful, but we couldn't update your coins. Please contact support.

referral.title: Redeem a Referral Code
referral.description: Enter a valid referral code to get free coins
referral.success: Success! {{coins}} coins have been added to your account.
referral.error: Invalid referral code. Please try again.
referral.loginRequired: Please log in to redeem a code.
